main.hero_subtitle: Experience the Next-Gen Cloud Terminal Ecosystem.
main.hero_desc: TN is an intuitive and powerful cloud terminal access management service for developers and engineers. Connect easily, manage safely.
main.feature_1_desc: Connect to servers with one click, no complex setup required.
main.feature_2_desc: Protect your data with state-of-the-art encryption technology.
main.feature_3_desc: Clean interface that anyone can use easily.
main.why_tn_desc: TN prioritizes user experience. We constantly strive to provide a fast, secure, and beautiful terminal environment.

user.title: My Page
user.withdraw_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
user.withdraw_error: An error occurred during account deletion:

guide.title: User Guide
guide.step_1: 1. <1>Sign Up</1>: Create an account via the 'Sign Up' menu.
guide.step_2: 2. <1>Log In</1>: Log in with your account to use the service.
guide.step_3: 3. <1>Terminal Management</1>: Manage terminals from the dashboard after logging in.
guide.step_4: 4. <1>My Page</1>: Edit profile and delete account in My Page.
